name: write-limiter
description: A stream that provides time-based limits on stream writes.

scripts.coveralls: node_modules/.bin/jscoverage index.js && USE_COVERAGE=1 node_modules/.bin/nodeunit --reporter=lcov test/test-write-limiter.js | node_modules/.bin/coveralls

author: Mike Maelzer <mmaelzer@gmail.com>
